prompt.fullscreen: Press 'cmd + ctrl + F' to toggle Fullscreen.
prompt.zoom: Zoom in to enlarge the screen.

welcome.large_window: Please make this window as large as possible.

eventMarker.found: Hold the USB event marker in front of the camera.
eventMarker.not_found: Note: no USB event marker found.

instructions.p1: During the task, you will see a series of neutral images and anxiety-provoking images.
instructions.p2: You will be asked to rate your level of distress from 0-10 in response to each images, where 0 is no distress and 10 is the highest level of distress.
instructions.fixation:
Throughout the experiment, you'll see this fixation point at the center of the screen.
Fixate your eyes on this fixation point.
instructions.rate: When you’re ready, rate your distress by dragging the cursor to the desired rating number and click to submit.
instructions.rate_practice: Try submitting a rating of “5” by dragging the cursor to “5” and clicking to submit the rating.
instructions.no_talking: Try not to talk or move around more than necessary, as movements affect the quality of the recordings.
instructions.instruction_end: In a few moments, the task will begin.
